title: If Riot made t-shirts....
body: If rito made t-shirts with draven axe icons on them, or even splash arts like graphic tees how many people would buy them?

replies.body:
There's the League of Draven shirt - is that the sort of thing?  Or are you specifically looking for splash art on a tee?

https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/clothing/shirts/league-of-draven-tee.html

I'm talking about splash arts on t-shirts, THAT would be sweet
edit: like rengars splash art on the front of a black t-shirt, or project fiora on a black t-shirt, or pool party mundo's splash would be especially cool, because it's got that chill vibe you feel me?
if they made a shirt with {{champion:161}}  on it; it would be an instabuy for me. especially if he is "examining" {{champion:55}} ;)
